articles.title: All Black Market locations in Fortnite - Polygon
articles.description: Our Fortnite C6S2 guide will tell you where to find every Black Market location, what you’ll find there, and how to earn Dill Bits.
articles.content:
Black Markets are an addition to Fortnite as of Chapter 6 Season 2, officially called Lawless. Theyll sell you all the gear you need to survive the lawless island in exchange for Dill Bits.
